newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products flat to lower in post-Easter lull.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products flat to lower in post-Easter lull.

text.p: NWE oil products were flat to lower on Tuesday, in light post-Easter trade.
Gas oil was stagnant amid flat IPE futures and steady premiums. Only barge premiums moved, easing some 50 cents.
Fuel oil held largely stable. High sulphur barges lost $1 to trade at $85 and $86.
Gasoline eased with a Eurograde barge trading at $200 fob ARA, and bids falling below that later on.
Naphtha was also softer in line with gasoline and weaker prices in the East.
